parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.12

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global
</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> This command is designed for MP. Hides object on all connected clients as well as JIP. Call on the <u>server only</u>. Can be used on static objects. In SP this command behaves just like [[hideObject]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''hideObjectGlobal''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - object to hide
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> object '''hideObjectGlobal''' hidden

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> hidden: [[Boolean]] - [[true]]->hidden; [[false]]->visible

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[hideObjectGlobal]] [[nearestBuilding]] [2500,2500,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>objectname [[hideObjectGlobal]] true;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[hideObject]], [[isObjectHidden]], [[deleteCollection]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 27, 2015 - 18:14 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:DreadedEntity|DreadedEntity]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
[[hideObject]] and [[hideObjectGlobal]] disable object collision in addition to rendering. '''A3 1.45.131175'''
(tested by hiding buildings and running through, driving through, flying through, and shooting through where the building used to be)
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 1, 2016 - 12:04 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
As of '''A3 1,62.134494''' running '''hideObjectGlobal''' in big loop may cause some objects not to be hidden for a players already connected or passed '''JIP'''. To avoid players rendering desync consider running that in '''preInit''' schedule of a server.
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on August 7, 2017 - 12:44 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:DrSova|DrSova]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''A3 1.72.142342''' when you hide object via [[hideObjectGlobal]], model sounds still be audible. 
For e.g. if you delete apex house from map, you still hear a conditioner sound at this spot
</dd>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 13, 2018 - 18:36 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Eventhandlers such as "explosion" will work on hidden objects
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
